hero.title: Welcome to smar target
hero.subtitle: Your Perfect Partner in Cafe & Restaurant Supply
hero.description: We are the leading supplier of consumer goods to cafes and restaurants across the Kingdom. We provide everything you need from cups, cans, bags, and supplies with exceptional quality and competitive prices

quality.title: Unmatched Quality
quality.description: All our products are manufactured to the highest international standards under strict quality control to ensure superior quality

innovation.title: Innovative Solutions
innovation.description: We continuously innovate and develop our products to keep pace with the latest developments in the restaurant and cafe industry

service.title: Outstanding Customer Service
service.description: A team of specialized experts ready to serve you around the clock and meet all your needs

delivery.title: Express Delivery
delivery.description: Fast and reliable delivery network covering all regions of the Kingdom with guaranteed on-time arrival

products.title: Our Premium Collection
products.subtitle: A comprehensive range of the finest consumer goods for cafes and restaurants

cups.title: Cups & Mugs
cups.description: Wide range of paper and plastic cups in various sizes and designs for coffee, hot and cold beverages

boxes.title: Beverage boxes
boxes.description: Diverse metal and plastic boxes for soft drinks, juices, and energy drinks in different sizes

bags.title: Food Bags
bags.description: Eco-friendly paper and plastic bags for fast food and takeaway with elegant and practical designs

accessories.title: Restaurant Supplies
accessories.description: Complete supplies including tableware, napkins, lids, and accessories needed to run your restaurant efficiently

clients.title: Our Valued Clients
clients.subtitle: We are proud to serve a diverse range of distinguished cafes and restaurants across the Kingdom

hero.title: About Us
hero.subtitle: smar target - Leading Supplier of Consumer Goods
hero.description: We are a Saudi company specialized in supplying high-quality consumer goods to cafes and restaurants throughout the Kingdom

story.title: Our Story
story.content: Our journey began with a clear vision: to be the trusted partner for cafes and restaurants in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. Since our establishment, we have committed to providing high-quality products and exceptional service that meets the diverse needs of our clients.
story.mission_text: We strive to be the first choice in supplying consumer goods to cafes and restaurants, by providing innovative products and outstanding services that contribute to our partners' success.
story.vision_text: To become the leading company in consumer goods supply in the region, and contribute to the development of the restaurant and cafe sector through our innovative solutions.

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: We commit to the highest quality standards in all our products and services

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We continuously strive to develop innovative solutions that meet our customers' needs

trust.title: Trust
trust.description: We build long-term relationships with our clients based on trust and transparency

sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.description: We care about the environment and provide eco-friendly products whenever possible

team.title: Our Team
team.subtitle: Specialized experts serving our clients
team.description: Our team includes a select group of specialists with extensive experience in consumer goods supply, who work passionately to provide the best services to our clients.

contact_cta.title: Start Your Journey With Us
contact_cta.description: Join hundreds of cafes and restaurants that trust our services

hero.title: Contact Us
hero.subtitle: We're here to serve you 24/7
hero.description: Reach out to us for any inquiry or request, our team is ready to provide the best solutions for your business

form.message_placeholder: Tell us about your needs or inquiries

location.description: Visit our headquarters in Riyadh to see our products and speak with our team directly
